title: Peloton Tread | Treadmill for Running, Walking, and Hiking with Manual or Auto-Incline Options and Immersive 24” HD Touchscreen
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Treadmills
description: Peloton Tread, Treadmill for Running, Walking and Hiking with Immersive 24” HD Touchscreen The Peloton Tread brings a studio experience home. Get a powerful cardio workout with a 24" HD touchscreen with front and rear-facing speakers. Unlock thousands of classes, both on and off the Tread, like running, walking, hiking, or Tread Bootcamp. When rest days come around, you can balance running and strength with yoga, meditation and stretching. Explore our lineup of 50+ instructors, and track your progress class after class using on-screen metrics. Your Peloton Tread is compatible with any ANT+ heart rate monitor, Apple Watch®, Strava, or any Android watch running Wear OS 3 or higher. Set up one-tap fitness tracking to monitor your heart rate and close your rings. All-Access Membership must be purchased separately in order to access Peloton classes on your Tread. You’ll pay one monthly fee for your entire household (Age, height and weight restrictions apply.) so everyone can access our entire library of classes that range from 5 to 90 minutes. With workouts that fit your experience level, mood, goals, music style, and schedule, you’ll be ready to train on and off your Peloton Tread or move anytime, anywhere with the Peloton App.
features: VALUE-PACKED MEMBERSHIP: A Peloton All-Access Membership must be purchased separately in order to access Peloton content on your Tread. You’ll pay $44/mo for your entire household and get unlimited access to our entire library of content available on your Tread and the Peloton App. Age, height, and weight restrictions apply. Your account can be activated on the touch screen during Tread assembly.

THOUSANDS OF LIVE & ON-DEMAND CLASSES: Access to thousands of classes, both on and off your Tread, like running, walking, hiking, strength, bootcamp, yoga, and more. To customize your workouts, Peloton allows you to stack classes, enabling you to transition from class to class with ease

IMMERSIVE, INTUITIVE RUNNING AND WALKING EXPERIENCE: Speed and incline knobs allow you to easily adjust controls without breaking your stride, or use auto-incline to automatically follow instructor cues up or downhill Use captions or receive spoken feedback from the Peloton Tread touchscreen with TalkBack Knobs with jump buttons.

On-screen shortcuts allow you to change speeds from 0 to 12.5 MPH and incline grades from 0% to 12.5% Clip-on the safety key while running and the belt will come to a quick stop if detached. Lock your Tread with a passcode when not in use

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS & METRICS: A wide-range of on-screen, real-time metrics enable you track progress, streaks and performance across workouts Follow training programs, or set personal targets during a freestyle workout, to help you meet your running and strength goals

CONNECT TO YOUR TRAINING DEVICES: Easily connect any ANT+ heart rate monitor, Apple Watch and Strava to your Peloton Tread to capture performance data, including Strive Score, an in-class metric on heart rate zones, from your workouts and track fitness goals

SPACE TO RUN ON A COMPACT FOOTPRINT: The Peloton Tread has a compact 5½' x 2¾' footprint that still has plenty of room for running and walking on its 59” textured, comfortable and quiet running belt Get a powerful cardio workout in less space than your average treadmill We recommend at least 24” of space to the left, right and front of the Tread, and 79” of space in the back for storing and training The ceiling height minimum is 20” greater than the user’s height

title: WaterRower Ash Rowing Machine with S4 Monitor | USA Made Water Rower | Original Handcrafted Erg Machine for Home Use & Gym
inStockText: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
features: The Waterrower - Designed in the mid '80s by Yale and US National Team Rower John Duke. WaterRower continues to combine a cool design with hard workmanship, our unique WaterFlywheel resistance and ethically sourced materials create an awesome rowing simulator

ASH WOOD - Hand-built in Rhode Island; all timber used in the manufacture of wooden WaterRower rowing machines is sourced from sustainably managed hardwood forests in the Appalachian Mountains. The ASH Rower is Made of Ash Wood with a Natural Color Finish

Smooth - Water rowers use a water-filled flywheel to provide resistance as you row. The resistance is created by the paddle-like blades of the flywheel moving through the water, creating a smooth and natural resistance that closely resembles the feeling of rowing on water. Like water, the harder you fight, the more resistance you get

Burn calories in short time - There are many benefits to rowing. It is a low impact cardiovascular exercise that puts less stress on your joints. Full body workout that includes your legs, core, back and arms. Perfect for all fitness levels. This water rowing machine targets all major muscle groups (84 percent of total muscle mass)
Dimensions - 82" L x 20" H x 22" W / weight: 103.5 lbs (with water). Easily store it on end

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
UNIQUE WATERFLYWHEEL 
The WATERROWER's unique WaterFlywheel has been designed to reproduce the precise physical dynamics of a moving boat; the surest way to replicate the physiological benefits and aesthetic pleasure of rowing. 
Like rowing, the WaterFlywheel does not apply resistance to you, you apply work to it; you are the engine. By the "rule of cubes", the amount of work you apply dictates the speed at which you row. From a gentle paddle to a “give it your all” workout, you are in control When rowing, remember, you are the engine. The amount of work you do is dependent on you, not on the machine. 
The more work you do, the more resistance/drag you can overcome, and the faster you move. The speed which you can maintain is dependent on the level of work you can maintain and, again, is limited only by you. Row harder and you go faster, row easier and you go slower. This is the self paced nature of the WATERROWER and Rowing and allows Anyone to row regardless of age, sex, size of level of fitness. 
WHY WATER 
INSTANT RESISTANCE 
The WATERROWER's unique WaterFlywheel design uses a specially formed paddle to cup the moving water, reduce slippage and produce an unrivaled simulation of the benefits of rowing. 
NO JERKING OR JARRING 
There is no jerkiness or jarring which is often associated with conventional mechanical rowing machines making the exercise unpleasant; only smooth even load, kind to the body, and relaxing to the mind. 
SMOOTH CONNECTION 
There is no "solid" connection between user and the moving water, simply an immersed paddle which dampens out any detrimental mechanical feel Providing some "give" is essential for accommodating bad or developing technique, lessening the risk of injury. 
EVEN STROKE 
A uniform stroke is essential to spreading the work more evenly over the muscle groups, working the muscle groups in proportion to their strength, optimizing exercise benefit while reducing risk of injury. 
S4 Monitor 
The S4 Monitor measures the speed of the paddle using an infrared detector mounted on the underside of the top deck and a castellated Sensor Pickup mounted on the inner clutch bush. The motion of the paddle revolved the sensor disk which in turn triggers the infrared detector 
Seating 
A comfortable seat for rowing is essential for optimizing performance and ensuring a satisfying and effective workout experience. Provides proper cushioning and contouring, while minimizing pressure points and promotes healthy posture. Helps keep your focus on generating powerful and efficient strokes. 
Wheels for mobility 
Wheels for easing the movement of the machine provide an efficient solution to transporting the rower. These wheels are designed to enhance mobility and maneuverability in various settings, making it effortless to reposition and store without the need for excessive manual effort or additional equipment

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Stamina Wave Water Rower 1435 
Rowing on the open water provides a dynamic, adaptive workout that helps you burn calories, tone the entire body, improve posture and more. Bring the benefits of water rowing into the comfort of home with the Stamina Wave Water Rower 1435. This Rower combines a carefully-designed combination of performance-oriented features and comfort elements to drive results. 
This rowing machine provides an effective strength-building workout that’s great for the whole body. 
Dynamic Water Resistance | Real-World Rowing Feel 
The dynamic water resistance on the Stamina Wave Water Rower 1435 offers an adaptive workout that matches your pace. Row harder to up the intensity or ease off for less. Control the baseline resistance by adding or removing water from the tank 
Folding frame for easy storage 
The compact, low-to-ground frame of the Wave Water Rower can be folded to save space. Use the built-in wheels to roll the Rower to storage. 
Engineered for Your Success 
Comfort is of utmost importance during workouts. That’s why the Stamina Wave Water Rower 1435 is outfitted with large foot pedals with easy-to-adjust straps, a molded and ergonomic seat, and a padded rowing handle with a durable nylon rowing strap. Monitor your performance by referring to the large, easy-to-read LCD monitor. The monitor displays calories burned, pulse, time, stroke count and total distance accrued on the Rower. SCAN Mode allows you to cycle through each of these metrics in real-time as you exercise. The included chest strap allows you to easily monitor your heart rate. 
Supported by müüv 
Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina equipment. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.

title: Hydrow Pro Rowing Machine with Immersive 22" HD Rotating Screen - Stows Upright | Live and On-Demand at-Home Workouts, Membership Required
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
description: Working out at home is a whole lot more exciting when you’re transported to, say, a Scandinavian fjord. Hydrow’s immersive experience takes you all around the world for full-body workouts – over 5,000, to be exact – led by world-class Athletes in stunning destinations. With a proprietary computer-controlled electromagnetic drag mechanism designed to mimic the feel of rowing on water, getting onto the Hydrow Pro feels about as close as it gets to really getting out there.
features: WORK MORE MUSCLES IN LESS TIME. Build with low-impact workouts that engage more than 86% of your muscles in under 20 (yes, 20!) minutes.

GET A MEMBERSHIP, THEN GET STARTED. For just $44/month, unlock over 5,000 at-home workouts for all fitness levels. Explore a range of workout styles, including cardio, strength, recovery, and more — all led by world-class instructors in stunning locations around the world. (NOTE: Memberships are sold separately from Hydrow rowing machines.)

ESCAPE INTO IMMERSIVE WORKOUTS. Featuring a crystal-clear 22” HD rotating touchscreen display with front-facing speakers, rowing on the Hydrow Pro rower is sure to take you places. Even better – the rower itself is designed to make indoor rowing feel like on-the-water rowing, thanks to our proprietary electromagnetic drag technology. Features include padded seat, adjustable foot straps, and a low-stress grip handle.

FITS RIGHT IN AT HOME. This foldable rowing machine can be stored upright using our Upright Storage Kit (sold separately). Dimensions: 86” L x 25” W x 47” H; Weight: 145 lbs; Weight limit up to 375 pounds.
CONNECT WITH YOUR GO-TO DEVICES. The Hydrow Pro at-home rower is compatible with bluetooth-based fitness devices like Apple Watch, heart-rate monitors, and wireless headphones.

title: WaterRower A1 Oak Rowing Machine | USA Made Water Rower | Original Handcrafted Erg Machine for Home Use & Gym | Best Warranty
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
features: The Original Waterrower - Handcrafted and Built to Last: Designed in the mid '80s by Yale and US National Team Rower John Duke. WaterRower continues to combine stylish design, handcrafted workmanship, our unique WaterFlywheel resistance and ethically sourced materials create the world's finest rowing simulator

Made in the USA - Hand-built in Rhode Island; all timber used in the manufacture of wooden WaterRower rowing machines is sourced from sustainably managed hardwood forests in the Appalachian Mountains. The A1 Oak Rowing Machine is specifically designed to be lightweight, portable, space-saving, and vertically stackable. In fact, 3 A1 rowing machines can be stored vertically in the same amount of space as ONE indoor cycling bike!

Smooth - Water rowers use a water-filled flywheel to provide resistance as you row. The resistance is created by the paddle-like blades of the flywheel moving through the water, creating a smooth and natural resistance that closely resembles the feeling of rowing on water. Like water, the harder you fight, the more resistance you get

Burn calories in short time - There are many benefits to rowing. It is a low impact cardiovascular exercise that puts less stress on your joints. Full body workout that includes your legs, core, back and arms. Perfect for all fitness levels. This water rowing machine targets all major muscle groups (84 percent of total muscle mass)
Dimensions - 82" L x 20" H x 22" W / weight: 98 lbs (with water). Easily store it on end

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
UNIQUE WATERFLYWHEEL 
The WATERROWER's unique WaterFlywheel has been designed to reproduce the precise physical dynamics of a moving boat; the surest way to replicate the physiological benefits and aesthetic pleasure of rowing. 
Like rowing, the WaterFlywheel does not apply resistance to you, you apply work to it; you are the engine. By the "rule of cubes", the amount of work you apply dictates the speed at which you row. From a gentle paddle to a “give it your all” workout, you are in control When rowing, remember, you are the engine. The amount of work you do is dependent on you, not on the machine. 
The more work you do, the more resistance/drag you can overcome, and the faster you move. The speed which you can maintain is dependent on the level of work you can maintain and, again, is limited only by you. Row harder and you go faster, row easier and you go slower. This is the self paced nature of the WATERROWER and Rowing and allows Anyone to row regardless of age, sex, size of level of fitness. 
WHY WATER 
INSTANT RESISTANCE 
The WATERROWER's unique WaterFlywheel design uses a specially formed paddle to cup the moving water, reduce slippage and produce an unrivaled simulation of the benefits of rowing. 
NO JERKING OR JARRING 
There is no jerkiness or jarring which is often associated with conventional mechanical rowing machines making the exercise unpleasant; only smooth even load, kind to the body, and relaxing to the mind. 
SMOOTH CONNECTION 
There is no "solid" connection between user and the moving water, simply an immersed paddle which dampens out any detrimental mechanical feel Providing some "give" is essential for accommodating bad or developing technique, lessening the risk of injury. 
EVEN STROKE 
A uniform stroke is essential to spreading the work more evenly over the muscle groups, working the muscle groups in proportion to their strength, optimizing exercise benefit while reducing risk of injury. 
S4 Monitor 
The S4 Monitor measures the speed of the paddle using an infrared detector mounted on the underside of the top deck and a castellated Sensor Pickup mounted on the inner clutch bush. The motion of the paddle revolved the sensor disk which in turn triggers the infrared detector 
Seating 
A comfortable seat for rowing is essential for optimizing performance and ensuring a satisfying and effective workout experience. Provides proper cushioning and contouring, while minimizing pressure points and promotes healthy posture. Helps keep your focus on generating powerful and efficient strokes. 
Wheels for mobility 
Wheels for easing the movement of the machine provide an efficient solution to transporting the rower. These wheels are designed to enhance mobility and maneuverability in various settings, making it effortless to reposition and store without the need for excessive manual effort or additional equipment

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Stamina BodyTrac Glider 1060 | Hydraulic Rowing Machine 
An upgrade to the highly-rated BodyTrac Glider 1050, the BodyTrac Glider 1060 Rower provides an efficient and effective workout, while rowing with ease, convenience and comfort. It provides effective, natural rowing movement suitable for toning major muscle groups including back, legs, arms, abs and glutes, and stimulating the metabolism for fat burning. Full-motion arms, a ball-bearing roller system, and the adjustable hydraulic cylinder resistance allow smooth, low-impact movements that mimic rowing on the water. 
The BodyTrac Glider is designed to maximize your short-term results while also supporting your long-term goals. 
Upgraded to Provide an Even Better Experience | Designed for Devices 
The upgrades include a deluxe molded seat for comfort, improved electronics with tablet holder (tablet not included) and larger footplates. The upgraded monitor keeps you motivated by tracking time, stroke count, calories burned and total count (all-time) with a scan function to rotate between each metric. Even better, the new, larger monitor features a tablet holder, so you can watch your favorite show while you work out. The full-range-of-motion rowing arms strengthen your arms, shoulders, and back while the push-off engages your legs and glutes. 
Foldable Row Machine | Save Space and Easily Store Away 
When you’re done rowing, the rower arms fold and the frame stands on end to save you space. 
Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina equipment. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.

modules.title: Upgraded to Provide an Even Better Experience | Designed for Devices
modules.text: The upgrades include a deluxe molded seat for comfort, improved electronics with tablet holder (tablet not included) and larger footplates. The upgraded monitor keeps you motivated by tracking time, stroke count, calories burned and total count (all-time) with a scan function to rotate between each metric. Even better, the new, larger monitor features a tablet holder, so you can watch your favorite show while you work out. The full-range-of-motion rowing arms strengthen your arms, shoulders, and back while the push-off engages your legs and glutes.

modules.title: Foldable Row Machine | Save Space and Easily Store Away
modules.text: When you’re done rowing, the rower arms fold and the frame stands on end to save you space.

Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina equipment. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.

title: adidas R-21x Rower
inStockText: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
description: The adidas R-21x Rower brings all the benefits of rowing into your home for one of the best all-around fitness experiences. Rowing benefits all major muscle groups and requires your upper and lower body to work together to build strength, improve cardio endurance, and tone your core. Working from a strong, chain-driven mechanism, the fan-based R-21x comes equipped with 16 levels of electronic and air resistance, which can be easily controlled using the handle's quick resistance keys. With the internal self-generating motor, you are the one that creates energy and powers the R-21x’s impressive features. No need for a power adapter, tangled wires, or restrictive plug sockets, you have the power and freedom to train anywhere in your home. With built-in transport wheels, it’s even easier to move the rower around your home as you wish. The R-21x’s console comes with 12 pre-set fitness programs to help keep the challenge varied and ensure you’re fully motivated to keep on rowing. The adjustable LCD screen helps you to track your progress by feeding back real-time workout data including, speed, time, distance, calories, strokes per minute, and 500m split. Accurate heart rate data is also available via the supplied wireless chest strap. If you’d prefer to watch the latest movies or boxsets while you row, a convenient tablet and smartphone holder have been built into the console to provide you with an optimum viewing angle when working out on the R-21x. The densely padded saddle and fully adjustable footplates will ensure you’re completely comfortable, so you can keep on rowing.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Self-Generating Power - Create Energy 
Built around a self-generating system, you are the one who creates energy and powers the R-21x’s impressive features. No need for a power adapter, tangled wires, or restrictive plug sockets, you have the power and freedom to train anywhere in your home. 
R-21x Performance 
Working from a strong, chain-driven mechanism, the fan-based R-21x comes equipped with 16 levels of electronic and air resistance, which can be easily controlled using the handle's quick resistance keys to ramp up your rowing sessions. 
Chest Strap Sensor 
Being able to track your heart rate throughout each workout is key to more effective training. The adidas R-21x Rower comes complete with a heart rate chest strap included, allowing you to accurately monitor your BPM for safer and stronger home workouts. 
Phone/Tablet Holder 
A tablet and smartphone holder have been integrated into the console, giving you the ability to easily watch video content while you row. The holder also allows you to blend your favorite training apps and online classes with your R-21x for the ultimate workout. 
R-21x Rower Console | Feedback and Control 
The R-21x’s console has 10 pre-installed programs to keep your workouts varied and challenging. The LCD display helps you track your progress with real-time workout data including, speed, time, distance, calories, pulse, and strokes per minute. 
Densley Padded Seat 
The R-21x Rower comes complete with a densely padded and ergonomically shaped seat. The design creates a more comfortable and rooted connection to the Rower, allowing you to achieve a stronger form and harness more power with every stroke. 
Easy Assembly + Setup Dimensions 
Quick to assemble with built-in transport wheels for easy movement, the R-21x comes with detailed and easy-to-follow instructions alongside all the tools needed to be set up and trained quickly. Setup dimensions: 93.7 (L) x 21.97 (W) x 49.21 (H) in. 
Quick Resistance Keys 
With resistance keys built directly into the Rower's handles, you're able to quickly and seamlessly make adjustments to your rowing intensity. Utilize the R-21x's 16 levels of electronically controlled air resistance without interrupting your rhythm.

title: SNODE Rowing Machine for Home Use, Rower with LCD Monitor, Ergonomic Seat, Dual Rail, HIgh Weight Capacity
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
description: The SNODE Rowing Machine is the perfect addition to your home gym, offering a full-body workout that targets multiple muscle groups. With its sturdy dual rail design and ergonomic seat, you can enjoy a smooth and comfortable rowing experience. The LCD monitor tracks your progress, displaying metrics like time, distance, and calories burned. This rower accommodates users up to 350 lbs, making it suitable for various fitness levels. Bring the benefits of rowing into your home and elevate your fitness routine with the SNODE Rowing Machine.
features: 【Thickened & Double Support Pipe】The dual and thickened pipe can effectively increase the stable of the rowing machine, which makes your training safe and sound. The max weight capacity is 350lbs.

【Coaxial Driving Sytem】The rower's flywheel and the belt share a common axis, which can effectively reduce the friction between the belt and the flywheel, this makes the driving system run smoother and last longer service life.

【16 Levels Magnetic Resistance】The rowing machine for home has 16 levels of resistance, which can meet the needs of different fitness levels of your family. You can adjust the resistance level by turning the resistance knob, so that the exercise intensity is more suitable for you.

【LCD Display & Bottle Cage】The rowing machine is equipped with a clear LCD display, which can display time, speed, distance, calories and count in real time, allowing you to monitor your exercise progress at any time. The build-in water bottle holder can keep you well hydrated which helps you focused on your training.

【MONITOR AND TABLET MOUNT】The machine also has a LCD monitor that tracks your distance, stroke time, calories, and workout time. You can place your phone on the tablet holder, which can be adjusted to the angle of the holder as needed. View your training data in the best positionand improve your training experience.

【Foldable and Portable】The rowing machine is foldable and portable, which is convenient for home storage and transportation. You can easily fold it up after exercise and put it in a corner of the house.
【Ergonomic Seat and Dual Rail】The rowing machine has a large ergonomic seat, which is soft and comfortable. Also, the dual slide rails cover alloy materials, makes the rowing experience smoother.

【To Our Customers】Brand new rower sold by SNODE has one year guarantee, so please contact us by the way below and let us know if any issues! CONTACT US: Find the order number in YOUR ORDERS > click "Contact seller"> send us a message.

items.text:

high flywheel mass

items.text:
Foldable & stowable in just a few steps - fits in every household!
Easy to move thanks to transport wheels
Dimensions when folded: 95 x 51 x 122 cm

items.title: SAFETY & COMFORT
items.text:
non-slip pedals for optimal grip
Ergonomic seat for comfort, even during long sessions
High quality standards

Here the leg training is included
Besides the back muscles, the legs and buttocks are used the most. This is because with every pull you lean against the machine and thus train thigh and calf muscles as well as your gluteus.

A strong shoulder to lean on
Every rowing move involves the contraction of the biceps, and the shoulder muscles in turn stabilise the position of the bar and your arms. So you have an arm and shoulder workout included.

Sexy Abs for Summer
A rowing workout burns off that pesky belly fat while strengthening those all-important core muscles. With it, you support your whole body and take the strain off your spine.

Strengthen your back
The latissimus, which defines the V-shape of the upper body, is particularly strengthened during rowing. In addition, you'll strengthen trapezius muscle & lower back, preventing back pain. Sexy Abs!

Healthy full-body workout in your living room
The machine not only defines your body, but also improves your overall fitness. Because it not only trains many muscle groups at the same time, but also your cardiovascular system.

For the long breath
Don't just train your stomach, legs and bottom, work on your stamina at the same time

title: WONDER CORE Pro Max Workout Equipment Home Gym, 4-in-1 Exercise Equipment: Rowing Machine, Leg Press Machine, Ab Glider Machine, Roman Chair, Fitness Equipment for Abdominal & Core Strength Training
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness
description: Do you find yourself dedicating a significant amount of time to commuting to the gym daily? Are you burdened with monthly gym membership fees? Are you still grappling with the desire to take your fitness results to the max but struggle to find the time?Well now you can with Wonder Core Pro Max. It's the 4 in 1 transforming system that will help get your core stronger and leaner than ever before, Wonder Core Pro Max puts the focus on your core, like a laser, blasting your upper lower middle ABS and obliques.Wonder Core Pro Max is more effective than doing AB exercises on the floor alone, that means you'll get the max results in the least amount of time and effort, not to mention it's also great for the entire family from teenagers to older adults, just about anyone can use it easily.Product Information & Specification:Product Name: Wonder Core Pro MaxModel: PM-01Brand: Wonder Core Suggested User Height: 4.92 - 6.23 ftMaximum Dynamic Load: 242 lb Product Net Weight: 28.7 lbColor: light gray Resistance: standard: 13.2 lb; optional add-on: 19.8 lbMaterial: Steel & Plastic (ABS-PP-Foam-PA)Dimension (L x W x H):Roman Chair: 44.1 x 34.8 x 30.9 inRowing Machine: 45.9 x 22.5 x 12.6 inAb Glider & Leg Press: 44.1 x 22.5 x 30.9 inFolded(for storage): 47 x 22.5 x 10 in
features: 💪4-in-1 Home Gym Equipment: The secret is its ingenious patented transforming design, 4 different machines packed into one, you will get a core shredding ab glider, a back and core strengthening roman chair, lower body toning leg press and a cardio blasting rowing machine all in one machine.You can switch between 4 different training modes and do not get bored.

💪Multifunctional Workout Equipment: With just a single fitness equipment, you get to work every major muscle group, your arms, abs, torso, glutes, legs, and even cardio. Whether you’re looking to get rid of those flabby arms, sagging bum, annoying love handles and muffin tops, the Pro Max will be the savior to weight loss and getting defined lines.

💪Roman Chair Mode: It was designed to work your core, lower back, side abs, glutes, and hamstrings. Adjust and add to your intensity depending on your fitness level by adding free weights and dumbbells, you can take your workout to the next level whenever you’re ready to take the challenge, it is an excellent tool for both beginners and advanced athletes.

💪Ab Glider Mode: Designed to target and strengthen your abdominal muscles. To glide your way to the new sexy midsection that you've always wanted, not only help you get the body of your dreams, but help you keep the body of your dreams with simple and easy exercises in just a few minutes a day.

💪Leg Press Mode: You can get an amazing lower body workout, helping to strengthen, tighten and tone your upper, lower legs and butt all in one smooth easy motion. Wonder Core Pro Max will help you get those lean sexy legs you've always wanted.
💪Rowing Machine Mode: Designed to simulate the action of rowing a boat. It offers the full body cardio workouts, it works it all, your core legs and upper body in all one quick continuous motion.

💪Foldable and Easy to Store: The sleek and patented design is not just practical, effective, but it folds up easily into a compact position for easy storage. Great for the bedroom, living room, office, cottage, and you’ll never have to miss a workout. It is basically a mini gym!

💪Save Time & Money: With the Pro Max, you can hop on and get in that daily workout whenever you have time, allowing you to easily burn off excess fat and achieve your fitness goals. You no longer need to spend a lot of time to hit the gyms and pay those monthly fees. There will never be another excuse like bad weather to drive to the gym, no time after work, or feeling bored with your workouts.

💪Exclusive APP: Search "Wonder Core Pro Max" on Google Play or App Store for download and installation, you can get loads of content and training tutorials, our world-class trainers have created a wide variety of workout tutorials for EACH of the four different modes!

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Heavy Duty and Durable Construction 
The NS-7874RW is made with sturdy frame with powder coating to protect the unit from rusting and to ensure its longevity. The nickel-plated steel chain is durable and helps the rowing machine operate smoothly and quietly. 
Build-In Transport Wheels 
The California Fitness Products Deluxe Rowing Machine NS-7874RW comes with built-in transport wheels to allow you to move the rower to your desired location with ease. 
Separates Easily for Storage 
The California Fitness Products Deluxe Rowing Machine NS-7874RW can easily be separated into two large pieces for easy storage when the unit is not in use. 
Quickly Control Air Flow Resistance 
Easily adjust the air flow going through your California Fitness Products Rowing Machine by adjusting the damper control between 1 and 10. In addition to adjusting resistance, the damper control also adjusts the amount of noise produced by the fan. 
The California Fitness Products Deluxe Rowing Machine by Marcy with Adjustable Air Resistance 
Textured Rowing Handle for Stability 
The NS-7874RW rower comes with a textured rowing handle with rubber grip pulls on a durable nickel-plated steel chain. These features can help you maintain stability and have a more enjoyable rowing experience! 
Adjustable Foot Plate 
The foot plates on California Fitness Products Rowing Machine can be adjusted to fit your feet for you to exercise comfortably. Simply move the foot plate upward or downward to find the best size for you and latch in place. 
Adjustable Foot Straps 
The adjustable foot straps help you to secure your feet in place during exercising. The adjustable foot plate and foot straps ensure your feet are both safe and comfortable throughout your intense workout. 
Adjustable Display with Removable Device Holder 
Use the large display screen to keep track of time, strokes, distance, watts, calories, and pulse rate (with optional chest strap sold separately). For your convenience, the display screen can tilt up and down to better fit your line of sight. In addition, a height adjustable / removable device holder is included so you can use your favorite device while you workout.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
ㅤ 
Two-Way Resistance = Twice the Workout 
PULL: The traditional row motion engages your back, biceps, deltoids, forearms, quads and calves.
PUSH: Better than a single-direction rower, you can switch to a forward press motion mid-workout to engage your chest, triceps, hamstrings, glutes and abs.
Torch Calories in Less Time 
With muscle activation in two directions, you can alternate between working and resting muscles to maintain intensity and maximize calorie burn.
Engaging a larger range of muscles leads to efficient workouts, minimizing muscle fatigue for effective exercise and better results.
Low Impact Cardio & Strength 
Move your body on a smooth elliptical path that is easy on the joints while activating every major muscle group.
Break the mold of linear training with a dynamic range of motion that strengthens and defines like no other machine.
Multi-Grip Handles for Muscle Targeting 
Change your grip on the fly to target specific upper body muscles.
High-grade, rubberized coating offers a durable, secure grip and sweat-resistant surface that’s easy to clean.
Easy-Access Resistance Selector 
Adjust between 7 levels of intensity mid-workout – dial up for max muscle burn or dial down to build endurance.
Integrated into the handle, the Shimano gear shift delivers a sure grip and a clear view of your resistance setting.
Smooth, Durable Magnetic Resistance 
Enjoy a smooth ride with the 22.7 lb. inertia-enhanced flywheel and quiet, no-friction magnetic resistance.
Contact-free resistance translates to low maintenance and long-lasting, reliable performance.
Previous page
Secure Footholds & Large Seat 
Wide foot straps with wrap-around ratchet bindings quickly adjust and release for easy secure and dismount. Large ergonomic bench seat comfortably accommodates all users with no adjustments required. 
Easy-Adjusting Stroke Length 
Tailor your stroke length between three settings to customize layback for optimum upper body and core engagement. 
5-Metric Display Console 
Track progress on a clear, comprehensive display in time, calories, distance, and strokes per minute. Monitor heart rate with on-screen pulse — Bluetooth HRM sold separately. 
Unique Compact Design 
No extra-long slide rail needed – the unique wheel and fork design maintains a compact motion and takes up less room than other rowing machines. 
Easy Transport and Storage 
With an easy lift of its lighter end, activate Power10's transport wheels for smooth mobility, and securely store upright to save space. 
BILT3-D Assembly & US-Based Service 
The free BILT app makes assembly a breeze with interactive animations for each step. Need help? Our US-based Teeter product experts are here for you via phone, email or chat. 
Next page
ㅤ 
Teeter Move App 
Motivation to Achieve Your Goals 

Access trainer-led fitness classes for every level, FREE on the Teeter Move app. Choose from our expansive library of on-demand classes with any iOS or Android device - any time! Our certified trainers make working out fun with classes that vary in length, fitness level, and workout type. Simply press play and get ready for a motivating and effective workout.

features: Free Connected App: Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit App with every Sunny Health & Fitness product—no membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track progress, challenge others, and much more!

Built For Cardio: This rowing machine is meant to be used indoors by anyone from fitness enthusiasts, to recovering athletes, and elderly citizens. This is a product that works your core and provides a multifunctional cardio workout. Perfect for anyone that wants to add a low impact cardio routine into their training plan.
Hydro + Magnetic Resistance: The water tank holds water at a 60-degree angle with 16 hydro blades that provides both water and magnetic resistance.
Long Slide Rail: At 48.8 inches for the slide rail length and 44.1 inches for the inseam length, this indoor rower can accommodate for nearly any body type.
Durable Construction: This rower is constructed with a sturdy frame and quality steel, so it is very sturdy and resilient. This is built to withstand the most intense workouts.
Convenient Storage: Simply tilt up for upright storage when you are done with your workout and no longer need the rower. Space efficient, fast, and easy to move around in smaller spaces.

Digital Monitor: The easy-to-read LCD monitor clearly displays your Calories, Distance, HRC/Pulse (Optional), Strokes Per Minute (SPM), Strokes, Time, Time/500, Total Strokes, and WATTs. The scan feature cycles through each display feature so you can track your progress and stay on top of your fitness goals.
Watch It Your Way: Place your mobile device in the device holder tray and stay engaged with your workout on the SunnyFit app and your favorite TV Show
Comfortable Handlebars: Easy grip, padded handlebars provide a comfortable grip while preventing calluses. Stay comfortable through long rowing sessions.

SUNNY STATE OF MIND: In our 20 years of serving the fitness community, we have impacted the lives of over 10 million customers, and we are confident that our indoor rowers are not only built to last but will also enable you to achieve your cardio goals. Our vision and core mission are to stand beside you throughout your entire process. We enable you to enjoy your workouts with our products and our SunnyFit app that comes with over 1000+ workouts taught by our certified Sunny Trainers.

features: From Brand ECHANFIT: Enabling you to enjoy a better workout journey through professional indoor cardio training machines is what we do. We have redefined the fitness experience and wholeheartedly served for over 10 years. We offer you a one year for replacement parts and answer in less than 12 business hours.

Smooth & Quiet Magnetic Resistance: The rowing machine is equipped with an advanced magnetic resistance system that allows you to experience smooth silent workout. There is no need to worry about disturbing your family or neighbors at all when you do your rowing workout indoors at any time of the day.

16 Levels of Adjustable Resistance: The rowing machine for home has 16 levels of resistance, ensuring that it caters to all family members, regardless of their fitness level. You can easily modify the workout intensity by simply turning the resistance knob, allowing for a personalized and progressive training experience.

LCD monitor & Tablet Holder: Stay on top of your fitness progress with the LCD monitor, which tracks time, count, speed, distance, calories, and total distance. Additionally, the built-in device holder lets you securely place your mobile device, so you can watch your favorite videos, making your exercise sessions more engaging and enjoyable.

Space-Efficient Design: Designed with home gyms in mind. Once your workout is complete, you can easily move the rower with the built-in transport wheels. Its allows for vertical storage, making it perfect for small spaces or apartments, ensuring it doesn’t take up unnecessary room.

Easy 30-Minute Assembly: With 90% of the rowing machine pre-assembled, the setup process is quick and hassle-free. In just 30 minutes, you can have your rowing machine fully ready for use, allowing you to start your fitness journey almost immediately without the frustration of complicated assembly.

Full-Body Workout: Rowing is an incredibly efficient full-body workout, engaging 92% of your muscles with each stroke. It specifically targets key muscle groups, including the legs, core, arms, and back, while providing a high-calorie burn. Not only does it help build lean muscle, but it also promotes cardiovascular endurance.

title: XTERRA Fitness ERG160 Rower
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
description: The XTERRA Fitness ERG160 Rower has everything you need to help you achieve your fitness goals in the comfort of your home. The magnetic flywheel resistance is smooth, quiet, and easily adjustable between 8 different levels to adapt to the demands of your training level. The durable aluminum slide rail on the ERG160 ensures a smooth rowing experience pull after pull. Stay on top of your most important workout data with the easy-to-read high-contrast LED display. The console also features a built-in accessory tray so you can make use of your favorite fitness apps, your favorite book, or simply keep your phone right where you can see it. Comfort and convenience are at the core of the XTERRA Fitness ERG160 magnetic rower with a foam padded handlebar, and a molded foam seat. Large, easily adjustable foot straps keep you secure, so you can feel confident and in control while you push your limits. A built-in water bottle holder is right at your feet, so you can stay hydrated, or keep your keys and other personal belongings within reach when you need them most.

From the manufacturer
PERFORMANCE 
The XTERRA Fitness ERG160 Rower is built to help you get the most out of your training. Smooth rowing motion is delivered through magnetic flywheel resistance and a durable frame with aluminum slide rail for long lasting maintenance free performance workout after workout. 
TECHNOLOGY 
A high-contrast LED console with adjustable angle displays your most important workout metrics in a simple, easy-to-read display. Designed with a convenient accessory tray located right on the console. It's perfect for holding a phone, tablet, or book to help keep you motivated. 
COMFORT 
Rowing is more comfortable than ever with the ERG160's ergonomically molded cushion. Plus with padded handles and adjustable foot straps, you get the most comfortable rowing experience possible, so you can focus more on your training. The built-in water bottle holder keeps essentials like water or remotes nearby right where you need them. 
ACCESSIBILITY 
The ERG200 comfortably fits users up to 6'2" and features a weight limit of 250 lb, enabling a variety of users in the house to share one piece of equipment. The battery-powered cordless design allows you to take your machine anywhere. Built with a space-saving compact frame design that can be stood on end when not in use, plus transportation wheels maximize mobility to help make moving and storing your rower a breeze. 
MORE DETAILS

title: Magnetic Rowing Machine for Home with 350lb Weight Capacity, 12/14 Level Magnetic Resistance, Foldable & Compact Rower Machine, Exercise Equipment for Home Gym, Row Machine Movable
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
features: Simulation of Rowing Boats: Due to its unique design of double scull and quality assurance, this magnetic rowing machine for home can simulate the experience of real rowing. It allows you to stretch your whole body and exercise muscles to the maximum extent for your fitness goals.

Adjustable Workout Resistance Level: This compact row machine offers 14 level of resistance for different exercise outcomes with 10-lb flywheel and premium magnetic control system. Level 1 to 4 helps users do the warming up activity; level 5 to 8 shapes users’ body ; level 9 to 12 keeps fat burning; level 13 to 14 allows users stretching muscles fully.

Visualization of Workout Data: The rower machine can easily tack and display your workout data including distance, time, calories burned, speed, heart rate, cadence and so forth. These data present your exercising condition, allowing you to monitor the progress of your fitness plan.

Easy Assembly and Movement: With two wheels in the front side, the magnetic rowing machine for exercise can be moved by simply lifting the back part. It has been partially assembled, all you need to do is finish the rest part, taking less than 30 minutes usually.

Simple and User-friendly Operation: Place this rowing machine on the floor and then sit down turning the resistance button to a suitable level of resistance. When you start exercising, the workout data would present itself and you can do the workout smoothly with durable and reliable rail system.

What type of pulley handle is on this rower? 
The SF-RW5515 features a durable nylon pulley. Pulley line is flat and provides a smooth and quiet pull with each row. 
How high does the seat sit from the ground? 
The cushioned seat measures 10.1 inches at its lowest and max 11.7 inches, making it easy to get on/off the machine. 
Is this machine easy to pack away to save space when not in use? Does it fold up by chance? 
Yes, there's a pin that you can remove to fold it in half, the sliderail will fold upward. Reinsert the pin to secure. Wheels at the front of the unit make it easily portable for storing. 
What type of pedals does the rower have? 
Pivoting pedals feature a textured non-slip surface. Built in straps are adjustable and fit all sizes to secure your feet in place. 
Will this rower provide a full body workout or is it targeted? 
Rowing provides an excellent full body workout! This low impact exerciser will workout the upper body, lower body, and even core muscles.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
UNIQUE WATERFLYWHEEL 
The WATERROWER's unique WaterFlywheel has been designed to reproduce the precise physical dynamics of a moving boat; the surest way to replicate the physiological benefits and aesthetic pleasure of rowing. 
Like rowing, the WaterFlywheel does not apply resistance to you, you apply work to it; you are the engine. By the "rule of cubes", the amount of work you apply dictates the speed at which you row. From a gentle paddle to a “give it your all” workout, you are in control When rowing, remember, you are the engine. The amount of work you do is dependent on you, not on the machine. 
The more work you do, the more resistance/drag you can overcome, and the faster you move. The speed which you can maintain is dependent on the level of work you can maintain and, again, is limited only by you. Row harder and you go faster, row easier and you go slower. This is the self paced nature of the WATERROWER and Rowing and allows Anyone to row regardless of age, sex, size of level of fitness. 
WHY WATER 
INSTANT RESISTANCE 
The WATERROWER's unique WaterFlywheel design uses a specially formed paddle to cup the moving water, reduce slippage and produce an unrivaled simulation of the benefits of rowing. 
NO JERKING OR JARRING 
There is no jerkiness or jarring which is often associated with conventional mechanical rowing machines making the exercise unpleasant; only smooth even load, kind to the body, and relaxing to the mind. 
SMOOTH CONNECTION 
There is no "solid" connection between user and the moving water, simply an immersed paddle which dampens out any detrimental mechanical feel Providing some "give" is essential for accommodating bad or developing technique, lessening the risk of injury. 
EVEN STROKE 
A uniform stroke is essential to spreading the work more evenly over the muscle groups, working the muscle groups in proportion to their strength, optimizing exercise benefit while reducing risk of injury. 
S4 Monitor 
The S4 Monitor measures the speed of the paddle using an infrared detector mounted on the underside of the top deck and a castellated Sensor Pickup mounted on the inner clutch bush. The motion of the paddle revolved the sensor disk which in turn triggers the infrared detector 
Seating 
A comfortable seat for rowing is essential for optimizing performance and ensuring a satisfying and effective workout experience. Provides proper cushioning and contouring, while minimizing pressure points and promotes healthy posture. Helps keep your focus on generating powerful and efficient strokes. 
Wheels for mobility 
Wheels for easing the movement of the machine provide an efficient solution to transporting the rower. These wheels are designed to enhance mobility and maneuverability in various settings, making it effortless to reposition and store without the need for excessive manual effort or additional equipment

modules.title: UNIQUE WATERFLYWHEEL
modules.text: The WATERROWER's unique WaterFlywheel has been designed to reproduce the precise physical dynamics of a moving boat; the surest way to replicate the physiological benefits and aesthetic pleasure of rowing.

Like rowing, the WaterFlywheel does not apply resistance to you, you apply work to it; you are the engine. By the "rule of cubes", the amount of work you apply dictates the speed at which you row. From a gentle paddle to a “give it your all” workout, you are in control When rowing, remember, you are the engine. The amount of work you do is dependent on you, not on the machine. 
The more work you do, the more resistance/drag you can overcome, and the faster you move. The speed which you can maintain is dependent on the level of work you can maintain and, again, is limited only by you. Row harder and you go faster, row easier and you go slower. This is the self paced nature of the WATERROWER and Rowing and allows Anyone to row regardless of age, sex, size of level of fitness.

title: Aviron Strong Series Rower: 22"" HD Touchscreen, Dual Air & Magnetic Resistance up to 100 lbs. Game-Based Workouts, Streaming, Compact Design, Black
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
description: The Aviron Strong Series Rower redefines at-home workouts, using its 22" HD touchscreen to deliver a truly unique fitness entertainment experience. Designed for all fitness levels and body types, it features dual air and magnetic resistance of up to 100 lbs. Enjoy a blend of full-body strength and cardio workouts and immersive programs that use game psychology to make every workout fun and addictive. Why settle for boring when you can have games, coached workouts, scenic rowing, access to your favorites streaming services and so much more—all in a compact, sleek design for easy storage.
features: HIGH-ENERGY & LOW IMPACT: Engage more than 86% of major muscle groups in full-body, low-impact workouts in under 20 minutes. Designed for all fitness levels and body types, it features dual air and magnetic resistance of up to 100 lbs. Enjoy a blend of full-body strength and cardio workouts and immersive programs that use game psychology to make every workout fun and addictive.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN & FEATURES: Packed with user-friendly features including Dual Air & Magnetic resistance with up to 100 lbs of resistance, Commercial grade whisper quiet nylon belt, 19” wide rotating handlebars for customized comfort and support, 4-way adjustable foot carriage for wide or slender hips, 22" HD Touchscreen, Built-in phone holder, Fan blades for cooling effect and Wide, ergonomic seating that promotes proper rowing form.

COMPACT DESIGN & UPRIGHT STORAGE: Compact and versatile, the Aviron Strong Series Rower features a space-saving design at 7 feet (84 inches), accommodates users up to 6'8" tall, and offers convenient upright storage without the need for a wall mount, ensuring both practicality and safety.

CONNECTIVITY: Enjoy the freedom of Bluetooth connectivity, seamlessly linking your favorite headphones or speakers and heart rate monitor for an immersive workout experience. Stay in sync with your fitness goals with Apple Watch compatibility, effortlessly tracking your progress and integrating seamlessly with your routine.

ENDLESS WORKOUT OPTIONS: Unlock limitless possibilities with our membership, offering access to a dynamic online community and expanding content hub. Enjoy streaming services, competitive races, multiplayer games, scenic rowing adventures, instructor-led classes, and more. Diverse collection ensures engaging full-body workouts. Membership optional but highly recommended for interactive content. (Membership sold separately.)

PREMIUM CONSTRUCITON: Designed for long term durability, Aviron's steel and aluminum construction coupled with over 1 million testing cycles, ensures your Aviron rower can withstand even the toughest workouts.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Sunny Health & Fitness Obsidian Surge 500 Water Rowing Machine - SF-RW5713 
The Obsidian Surge 500 Water Rowing Machine keeps your workouts engaging & challenging. Studies indicate rowing works up to 85% of the body’s muscular system without the joint impact of other conventional cardio exercises. This in turn results in higher calorie expenditure in a shorter period of time. Compatible with ANT+ heart rate technology, like heart rate belts or watches, so you can measure an accurate pulse when transmitted to the advanced digital monitor. Heart Rate Belt Sold Separately. 
The water resistance creates a smooth and steady rowing experience with every stroke
The R2 Fitness Meter is designed to accurately track all essential workout metrics
Slide Rail Lenght: 42 inches. Slide Rail Inseam: 38 inches
The 16 fan blades provide unlimited resistance and a dynamic response caused by the harmonious interaction with the water, giving the user a unique experience
Molded padded seat is designed to be comfortable and functional. Seat dimensions: 10L x 12W x 2H inches
HYDRO-BLADES 
Hydro blades are built to endure vigorous rowing strokes and will keep up with multiple levels of water resistance. The paddles rotate and push against the water while withstanding water corrosion and damage. 
R2 FITNESS METER 
Compatible with ANT+ heart rate technology, such as heart rate belts or watches, so you can measure an accurate pulse and monitor the effectiveness of your workout. 
*Heart rate belt sold separately. 
WATER RESISTANCE 
Dive into your workout with water resistance designed to strengthen muscles and provide excellent cardio benefits. Water creates a smooth and steady rowing experience with every stroke. 
DESIGN 
Constructed with light weight sturdy steel, for solid performance and durability. The 16 hydro blades mimic the dynamic movements of competitive rowing. 
NON-SLIP FOOT PADS WITH NYLON STRAPS 
Strap into the large, textured and non-slip foot pedals for a stable ride. Fastener straps adjust to the width of your foot while the pedals pivot for absolute stability and comfort. 
FLOOR STABILIZERS 
Levelers located on the bottom adjust so the Obsidian is correctly leveled with your floors. Simply turn the leveler to match the floor in order to have the machine remain level without wobbling. 
TRANSPORTATION WHEELS 
Making the transformation of your home into your personal fitness studio is effortless with these convenient transport wheels. Simply tilt and roll out for use or away for storage. 
SPACE SAVER 
Store upright when not in use. Recommended to be placed upright against the wall for storage.

title: JOROTO Rowing Machine, Air Magnetic Foldable Rowing Machines for Home Use, Rower Machine with 49.5" Rail, Backlit Monitor, Bluetooth, App Supported, Tablet Holder
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
features: Foldable Rowing Machine MR60 - The New Masterpiece of JOROTO!
JOROTO Professional Commercial Grade Rowing machines for home use as well, very sturdy and durable, 1-year time for all replacement parts without any cost!

【UPGRADED DUAL RESISTANCE SYSTEM】With a unique dual resistance system that combines air and magnetic resistance, the 32 blades, paired with a 10lb flywheel, provide a dual resistance performance that far exceeds that of ordinary rowing machines for home use, offering you the exceptional experience of a professional commercial-grade rowing machine.

【SMOOTH & STURDY & QUIET ROWER】 The rail is made of high-quality aluminum material, which not only provides you with an even smoother experience but also effectively reduces scratches. The thickened carbon steel foot tube enhances the load-bearing capacity, making the JOROTO row machine more stable and durable. Compared to traditional air resistance rowing machines, JOROTO rower machine with a dual air-magnetic system operates more quietly. Weight Capacity: 350 lbs.

【MEDICAL-GRADE ACCURATE & KINOMAP SUPPORT】Place your phone or iPad on the tablet holder, then enjoy an immersive rowing experience through the Bluetooth connection to all apps that support the FTMS Protocol, such as Kinomap. The medical-grade LCD display ensures the accuracy of time, time/500m, strokes, total strokes, distance, calories, RPM, and pulse, and the backlight function allows you to easily read all data at any time.

【EXTENDED TRACK LENGTH】The extensive 49.5’’ rail provides ample space for tall users, ensuring a smooth and unrestricted rowing experience, suitable for almost all users. The high-resilience seat, combined with ergonomic design, provides excellent breathability and wear resistance, ensuring comfort even with prolonged use.

【INNOVATIVE RESISTANCE ADJUSTMENT】Different from general air rowing machines, the JOROTO rowing machines for home foldable uses a racing handle to adjust the resistance, making the resistance adjustment more sensitive and convenient. 10-Level adjustable resistance, catering to various workout intensities. Whether you are a beginner or a professional, you can get an efficient workout through the various resistance levels.

【EASY TO FOLD & STORE】Adopting a precise hydraulic spring system, the folding process is particularly effortless. You simply need to lightly step on the pedal and lift the rail to easily fold it. The built-in handle and wheels, which roll smoothly, ensure easy and convenient storage and movement. Folded size: 47.2*66.3**20.5 inches (L*W*H).

【LIFETIME CUSTOMER SUPPORT】You get more than just a rower machine! JOROTO provides lifetime customer support! 7/24 customer supporting team response opportunely! Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or problems!

【30 DAYS EXTENDED KINOMAP SUBSCRIPTION】Joroto has developed a deep cooperation with Kinomap - One of the Top Training Apps on market! Joroto offers an Extended 30 Days Kinomap Subscription for Joroto trainers, with the 14-day trial period you will be able to use all functions and join all courses in Kinomap for 44 days in total with no cost! Contact Joroto after purchase to get the Kinomap activation code!

description: Experience a total body workout on the Row S! features: Enjoy a FREE 30-day trial of the Echelon Premier Membership with access to more than 3,000 live and on-demand connected fitness classes led by the world's best instructors through the Echelon Fit App. Classes range from 5 to 45 minutes and are designed for everyone from beginner to pro athletes. The height-adjustable design ensures that the rowing machine adapts to your body, providing optimal comfort and ergonomics. When not in use, the rowing machine can be easily folded and stored, making it perfect for apartments or limited spaces. Its sturdy construction guarantees stability and durability, providing you with a reliable exercise companion for years to come. Get ready to row your way to fitness with the Adjustable Magnetic Resistance Rowing Machine. Invest in your health and enjoy the convenience of a home gym with this versatile and compact fitness equipment. Start your fitness journey today!
features: Adjustable Magnetic Resistance: Achieve the perfect workout intensity with the adjustable magnetic resistance feature of this rowing machine. Customize your workout by increasing or decreasing the resistance level according to your fitness goals and preferences.

title: Body-Solid Endurance (R300) Air Resistance Indoor Rower - Cardio & Total Body Workout Machine with Self-Generating Power
inStockText: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
description: The Endurance by Body-Solid R300 Indoor Rower delivers an effective low-impact cardio and total body workout. Not only does the rowing movement provide users with high-intensity calorie-burning cardio but works quadriceps, hamstrings, abdominals, obliques, lats, biceps, triceps, hip flexors and more. User-controlled air resistance puts users in full control for a balanced and coordinated workout. The R300 is a self-generating machine eliminating power requirements for peak energy efficiency in home or commercial settings. A precision-engineered flywheel design minimizes noise. Nickel-plated chain offers unmatched durability in even the most intense environments. A textured, ergonomic handle allows users to row with natural hand and arm positions while fully adjustable footrests provide users a safe and comfortable workout on the R300 Indoor Rower. A convenient cell phone holder can be used for both entertaining and workout tracking purposes. The interactive console reports on time, heart rate, calories, paddle width, stroke rate, distance cycle and watts and is Polar compatible.  8 different exercise programs -Quick Start, Distance, Time, Calories, Game, Intervals (20/10. 10/20. 10/10) - are also built into the console. Ideal for home, commercial and group workout settings.  Rowers have seen a resurgence of popularity in recent years driven in part by their usage in cross fit and other hot exercise programs.  Pair this with our other cross fit oriented product like our FB300 Fan Bike and our new Power Racks and Half Racks to satisfy the needs of any training facility.
features: INDUSTRY LEADER: For 30+ years, Body Solid has held the widest array of products designed to meet the demands of the ever-changing fitness industry (home gym, free weight machines, treadmills, bikes, ellipticals, weight plates, kettlebells, dumbbells, flooring, accessories and more). Our products are cutting edge and reliable and are built for Life……Your Life.

PERFECT FOR ALL FITNESS LEVELS: Its user-controlled air resistance allows for a balanced workout, catering to all fitness levels. The durable, nickel-plated chain and precision-engineered flywheel ensure a quiet, smooth rowing experience, while the textured handle and adjustable footrests offer comfort and stability.

CONVENIENT AND PORTABLE: This Indoor Rower's multi-piece design allows for easy disassembly, making storage and transport a breeze. Perfect for space-saving in home gyms or for moving to different workout areas, this rower is as versatile as it is robust, with a weight capacity of 330 lbs to accommodate a wide range of users.

FULL-BODY WORKOUT: Experience a comprehensive workout that targets all major muscle groups, including the quads, hamstrings, abdominals, obliques, lats, biceps, triceps, and hip flexors. This Indoor Rower offers a low-impact, high-intensity cardio session that enhances endurance and strength, making it ideal for both intense training sessions and steady-state cardio workouts.

INTELLIGENT DESIGN & ENTERTAINMENT: Keep your workouts fresh and enjoyable with this Indoor Rower's convenient cell phone holder, allowing you to listen to music, watch videos, or track your fitness stats. Measures 95.1"x24.4"x39.8" and weighs 81.1lbs.

【HOW IT WORKS】Tone the lower body by using your glutes, quads, and hamstrings to push down to a squat. Work your shoulders, back, and chest as you push yourself up through every rep.

【REDUCED JOINT IMPACT】Skip the weights, this squat trainer will reduce the amount of stress on the knees and joints that occurs when you squat incorrectly. Adding this to your workout will help you develop a proper form to get the perfect squat

【TRACK YOUR FITNESS】The LCD monitor tracks your calories, scan, time, and count. This trainer gives you the freedom to add or remove tension, the three elastic bands can be clipped on or off the seat to adjust to any fitness level

【WORKOUT VARIETY】Not only does it offer the ability to do a full-range squat, but you can also add variety by doing high, median and low zone squats pulses. The all-in-one squat assist fitness solution for a well-rounded and diverse workout experience

【CONVENIENT HASSLE-FREE SETUP】Assemble with ease and start your fitness journey without delay. Remove the knob, fold, and store. Self-leveling pedals and stability end caps ensure a smooth, stable workout

【COMPACT DESIGN】Crafted with you in mind, without compromising in performance or functionality or durability, the machine has a small footprint with our innovative design. Easily store almost anywhere in your home

【IMPROVE YOUR GLUTE & LEG TONING】Squat, Row and Ride with precision, engage in dynamic rowing exercises, target your glutes and legs for real toning results within a few weeks, sculpt your abs, and undertake strength training

【SMOOTH GLIDE MANEUVER】With a full range of motion, activate your metabolism and engage your full body to feel the burn. Without complicated arrangements or expensive gym membership fees, from the comfort of your own home, at the time of your convenience

ASSIST IN PROPER SQUATTING

BENT OVER ROW 
Single arm upright rows help to strengthen your back and biceps, and can easily be completed by dismounting your Row-N-Ride and pulling up and back on the seat. 
DEADLIFT 
The Row-N-Ride can even be used to complete deadlifts, which are great for targeting the posterior chain muscles like the glutes, hamstrings, calves, and core! 
INCLINE CHEST PRESS 
Challenge your upper chest, shoulders, and core muscles as you press up on the seat of your Row-N-Ride to complete incline chest press.

Sunny Health & Fitness Row-N-Ride PRO Squat Assist Exercise Trainer - SF-A020052 
The Sunny Health & Fitness Row-N-Ride PRO is the ultimate squat assist trainer. This space efficient home exercise trainer excels at helping you achieve a total body workout. Activating multiple groups of muscles requires more energy, so you will burn more calories throughout your workout. Compound exercises bring compounded results. Hydraulic and resistance bands provide the necessary tension to build and tone muscle.

title: JOROTO Rowing Machines for Home Use, Foldable Rower Machine with Bluetooth Monitor, Tablet Holder Water Rowing Machine
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
features: 【FSC certified solid oak】: Crafted from premium solid oak, JOROTO MR280PRO water rowing machines for home use not only offers durability but also show the natural beauty of the wood. FSC certified solid oak frame ensures that the wood is sourced responsibly, promoting sustainable forestry practices. The excellent durability and stability to support 330lbs/150kg max load. Rail Suitable for Users with a Maximum Leg Length of 39"/99cm.

【Smooth & Realistic Rowing Experience】:With our advanced water resistance system simulating the natural resistance of rowing through water, making each stroke feel effortless.Tank of the water row machine features 6 water level markings that allow you to adjust the resistance by adding or reducing water according to your desired intensity. The ergonomic seat, equipped with organic polymer PU rollers, ensures a quiet and comfortable glide, allowing you to focus on your workout.

【Bluetooth Monitor Connect with Kinomap】: Take your workouts to the next level by connecting the water rowing machine monitor to the Kinomap app via Bluetooth. Immerse yourself in stunning virtual rowing environments, from tranquil lakes to challenging rivers. The interactive experience adds excitement and variety to your workouts. As a kinomap partner, JOROTO provide a 30-day subscription code without any costs, allowing you to explore a wide range of training content and unlock new challenges.

【New Upgraded Design】: Added tablet holder enhance your workout experience by placing your Ipad or phone on the tablet holder. Access the Kinomap app or enjoy your favorite shows, movies, or music to make your workouts more enjoyable. The pedal support board has been replaced with a steel plate, offering stronger weight-bearing capacity and resistance to deformation compared to wooden boards.

【Foldable Rower Machine】:180°foldable new storage design save home space, with the natural beautiful oak texture looks it like a beautiful piece of furniture. folded size: 21.3*17.5*35.8"/54*44.5*91cm. With patented sealing technology, no need to drain after use and no water leakage when stored upright.

【One-Package Delivery】: We've made your assembly process more easier. The rowing machine is delivered as a complete package and is currently 90% assembled. Just install the seat and you can start your fitness journey right away.

【JOROTO Support】: JOROTO has always not only been committed to the research and development of professional fitness equipment, but also focusing on customer experience. Our dedicated support team response 7/24 to address any issues or concerns you may have.

title: Concept2 Model D Upgraded New Rowing Machine Indoor Rowing Machine for Exercise Control Your Workout Intensity with PM5 Performance Monitor and Bundled with HogoR Cleaning Cloth
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
features: Reliable Workout Data : The powerful PM5 Performance Monitor, standard with every RowErg, provides repeatable, comparable data for every workout. The PM5 offers a simple “Just Row” mode or allows you to set up a variety of workouts. The monitor shows you a wide range of data, including pace, watts, stroke rate and Calories and automatically stores this information in either its internal memory or a USB drive.

Get Connected : One monitor, many training options! Our open-platform Performance Monitor connects via Bluetooth to your smartphone or tablet and is compatible with over 30 different apps, including our own ErgData. Whether you’re after online classes, coaching and training programs or virtual racing, there’s an app to suit you.

Integrated Device Holder : Now it’s easier than ever to use ErgData, or any of your other favorite apps, while rowing. Each new RowErg comes with a device holder that allows you to keep your smartphone or tablet securely in place. The device holder fits everything from small smartphones to large tablets such as the iPad Pro and is easily and quickly adjustable.

One Machine, Two Height Options : Our standard RowErg has a 14” seat height, while our elevated version has taller legs that provide a 20” seat height. The elevated version is a good choice if you like the convenience and appearance of a taller machine. The increased seat height can also make it easier to get on and off.

Flywheel and Damper : Our RowErgs use air resistance to respond to your effort on every stroke, so you are in full control of your exertion and resistance at all times. The spiral damper allows you to easily adjust the airflow to the flywheel, so you can change the feel of the stroke to suit your preference. The flywheel design minimizes noise while maximizing a smooth feel.

Storage and Mobility : The RowErg is easy to wheel around for workouts and can be quickly separated into two pieces (no tools required) for compact storage. Ideal for homes or gyms that need flexible space. The taller legs of the elevated version feature large caster wheels for easier moving.

Adjustable Footrests and Ergonomic Handle : Adjustable footrests allow for quick and easy sizing to fit a wide range of shoe sizes. We designed the ergonomic handle with a 10-degree bend that allows you to row comfortably with a natural arm and hand position.

Reliable Workout Data, Integrated Device Holder
Integrated Device Holder, Adjustable Footrests and Ergonomic Handle
Is the Concept2 RowErg the same as the Model D Indoor Rower or the Model E Indoor Rower? 
The RowErg with standard legs has a seat height of 14 inches/36 cm and is the same as the Model D Indoor Rower. The only difference is the new name and machine graphics. 
Why might the RowErg with tall legs be right for me? 
Places such as gyms or health clubs might prefer their users to be seated at a similar height to users on other equipment, making the RowErg more visible. 
Why do you now call it the RowErg? 
The new name RowErg aligns better with our other two ergometers, All of our exercise machines are technically ergometers, or “ergs” for short, because they actually measure the work that you are doing. 
Is the RowErg available in gray? 
No. Both height options of the RowErg are available only in black. 
Can I put the taller legs on my RowErg? 
Yes, the tall legs are available as a retrofit option for the RowErg as well as for the Model C and D Indoor Rowers. 
Technical Specifications

From the manufacturer
Sunny Health & Fitness SF-RW5856 Magnetic Rowing Machine Rower, Flywheel and LCD Monitor with Device Holder 
Boost your in-home cardio exercise with the Sunny Health and Fitness Flywheel Rowing Machine. The magnetic rowing machine, which supports up to 285 lb, has large foot pedals, comfortable seating, and stabilizing feet for safety and comfort. Take advantage of the transportation wheels to conveniently move the compact rower. Fold the indoor rowing machine upright to store it in limited spaces. 
16 levels of magnetic resistance to modify workout intensity
Produce smooth and powerful strokes while gliding on the 44.5-inch slide rail with 42.5-inch inseam
Easy-to-read digital meter tracks time, calories burned, and stroke count
Use the mode button on the digital meter to tailor specific workout goals during each exercise session
Built-in device holder conveniently stores your mobile device while you workout
Bottle holder keeps your favorite workout drink close by
EXPOSED FLYWHEEL 
Challenge yourself with dual resistance by engaging both the flywheel and 16 levels of adjustable magnetic resistance. 
DIGITAL MONITOR W/ DEVICE HOLDER 
Track workout stats in real time with the built-in monitor. Tablet holder conveniently stores your mobile device while you workout. 
16-LEVEL ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE 
With a simple twist, you can increase or decrease up to 16 levels of resistance, so your workout can remain challenging and effective. 
FLOOR STABILIZERS 
No matter the surface of your home, you will have a stable, stationary workout. Adjust the height of each foot leveler to create a balanced rowing experience. 
NON-SLIP PEDAL W/ ADJUSTABLE STRAP 
Oversized textured non-slip foot plates will accommodate all sizes, while remaining grip to ensure safe footing during the most demanding, vigorous workouts. 
NON-SLIP HANDLEBARS 
Help prevent calluses with our improved handlebars. Foam padded handlebars deliver a comfortable ride and allows for multiple hand positions. 
WIDE CUSHIONED SEAT 
Extra padding helps relieve pressure points in the tail bone due to sitting and relieves the 'falling asleep feeling' when circulation is cut off. 
TRANSPORTATION WHEELS 
Making the transformation of your home into your own personal fitness studio is effortless with these convenient transport wheels.
